snippet.title: The Adventures of Bluke Bifton: Chapter 1 - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Bluke Bifton arrives on PC July 20th!
WISHLIST ON STEAM! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1210470/The_Adventures_of_Bluke_Bifton/

Journey across the once-peaceful Isle of Flungo, crafting alliances (or making enemies) with a wide cast of strange, fully-voiced characters. It's time to meet some new friends, make some unexpected choices, and stand up against some violent, quite-possibly-insane foes! Uh... hope you're ready for an adventure!

Website: https://brainloafstudio.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BrainloafStudio
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/BrainloafStudio/
Discord server: https://discord.gg/nxjcGnh
